title: Former Miami-Dade Police Officer Sentenced to 48 Months in Prison (United States Attorney's Office for ...
text: ( Source : United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of Florida ) A former Miami-Dade Police Department officer was sentenced to 48 months in prison, to be followed by three years of supervised release, by U.S. District Judge
